channel.title: getallobjects on SoftLayer API
channel.description: Recent content in getallobjects on SoftLayer API

item.title: Get Security Group Details
item.description: =begin @author Ryan Tiffany =end require 'softlayer_api' require 'pp' client = SoftLayer::Client.new(:timeout => 120) secGroupId = 70501 getAll = client['SoftLayer_Network_SecurityGroup'].object_with_id(secGroupId).getAllObjects pp getAll
